title: Pimenteira da India (Schinus Molle)
body: A tree from Peru, with drooping branches and compound leaves, with a large number of narrow leaflets and a spicy smell when crushed between the fingers. In the estates and gardens of Funchal, male and female individuals of Schinus molle appear, which bloom almost all year round.

Funchal: Male and female individuals of Schinus molle appear, which bloom almost all year round
